directions: Pour applesauce into a small saucepan, and bring to a boil. Stir in gelatin until dissolved, then set aside to cool for about 1 hour. When cooled, gradually whisk in the ginger ale. Refrigerate until set, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O® mix
title: Fizzy Gelatin Salad
